toolclip.title: Interactive Groom Editor
toolclip.text: Opens the Interactive Groom Editor, which is the main tool for creating, editing, and managing modifiers and sculpting layers for interactive grooming hair.

toolclip.title: Create hair and fur
toolclip.text: Create hair and fur using interactive grooming splines.

resourcelist.link: Get started with XGen interactive grooming
Create hair and fur using interactive grooming splines
Control the density of the hairs

toolclip.title: Place Tool
toolclip.text: Adds single hair strands. Use this tool when you need to precisely position individual hairs.

resourcelist.link: Control the density of the hairs

toolclip.title: Length Tool
toolclip.text: Lengthens or shortens hairs uniformly without modifying their shape.

toolclip.title: Cut Tool
toolclip.text: Trims hairs that intersect with the brush radius.

toolclip.title: Width Tool
toolclip.text: Scales the width of hairs without modifying their shape.

toolclip.title: Twist Tool
toolclip.text: Rotates CVs along the length of splines and guides without affecting the overall curvature or shape. This tool is designed for workflows that convert final grooms to Maya geometry.

resourcelist.link: Align interactive grooming splines and guides
Convert XGen hair and fur to Maya geometry

toolclip.title: Comb Tool
toolclip.text: Changes the orientation and bend of hairs in the direction of the brush stroke.

toolclip.title: Grab Tool
toolclip.text: Selects and moves hairs based on the direction and distance you drag.

toolclip.title: Smooth Tool
toolclip.text: Straightens hairs and smooths transitions between hairs of different size and shape.

toolclip.title: Noise Tool
toolclip.text: Paints 3D noise to vary hair orientation making hair appear more natural.

toolclip.title: Clump Tool
toolclip.text: Pulls hairs together to form clumps.

toolclip.title: Part Tool
toolclip.text: Pushes hairs away from each other either.

toolclip.title: Freeze Tool
toolclip.text: Locks hair strands so they cannot be modified.
